title: Integrations - OpenProject
content: OpenProject integrations Connect your tools and services with OpenProject to streamline your team collaboration and project management processes. Integrations for OpenProject Create synergies between your tools and OpenProject OpenProject integrates deeply with many systems, enabling powerful workflows. Find out more about available integrations: Nextcloud Together strong: combine the best of Nextcloudâs file management and content collaboration with your project management. Learn more OneDrive/SharePoint The OneDrive/SharePoint integration centralizes document access and collaboration directly within your projects. Learn more GitHub The OpenProject and GitHub integration streamlines development workflows by linking pull requests and project management tasks. Learn more GitLab The GitLab integration enhances workflows by connecting project management with merge requests of your DevSecOps platform. Learn more File storages Nextcloud and OneDrive/SharePoint integrations to connect your file management with project management Keep your team organized and your workflows seamless with powerful file management integrations that bring everything you need into one place. Effortlessly share, access, and collaborate on files without switching between tools, ensuring that your team can focus on what matters most. Nextcloud integration Combine the power of open source software with full data control: Integrate OpenProjectâs project management with Nextcloudâs secure, self-hosted file management. Upload, access, and share files directly within your projectâs work packages, enabling seamless collaboration while ensuring top-notch security and compliance. Learn more about the Nextcloud integration Enterprise add-on OneDrive/SharePoint integration Integrate OpenProject with established tools in your organization: Streamline document management by integrating SharePoint or OneDrive with your projects in OpenProject. Easily bring your files, folders, and data into your workspace, creating a centralized hub for your team. Facilitate seamless collaboration by ensuring all project-relevant documents are just a click away, enhancing efficiency and reducing bottlenecks. Learn more about the OneDrive/SharePoint integration Repository management GitHub and GitLab integrations to connect your development with project management Streamline workflows by connecting project management with DevOps. GitHub integration Integrate and improve your development workflow: Connect OpenProjectâs project management with GitHubâs powerful version control system. Link branches, pull requests, and commits directly to your projectâs work packages. View GitHub actions in OpenProject and have the latest developments integrated in your projects. Learn more about the GitHub integration GitLab integration Simplify your development process with seamless integration: Connect OpenProjectâs project management with GitLabâs comprehensive version control and CI/CD platform. Link commits, branches, and merge requests directly to your projectâs work packages, enabling clear communication and collaboration between developers and project managers. Track changes, manage tasks, and stay aligned. Learn more about the GitLab integration Community integrations and plugins Benefit from user-built integrations for OpenProject Connect your Excel sheets, time tracking tools and more with OpenProject. Thanks to our skilled Community, there are some more integrations that are not maintained by ourselves, but nevertheless quite useful: Excel The OpenProject Excel synchronization helps people to automatically import data from their Excel files to OpenProject â and the other way round. Slack There is an OpenProject Slack integration from the Community. It messages a configured Slack channel, every time a work package or Wiki site is modified. Thunderbird There is an OpenProject add-on for Thunderbird from the Community. It provides the ability to create work packages directly from Thunderbird. Time tracking tools There are plugins for several time tracking tools, like Timesheet or Toggl. In the last years, time tracking features at OpenProject improved a lot, so you might not need any integration. Further integrations with major open source partners are planned In addition to maintaining existing integrations, we are planning to work on further collaborations soon. This is based on our clear focus on open source values and the vision of ensuring free and secure collaboration for everyone. More specifically, we collaborate with XWiki and Element to provide integrations. Both open source solutions are not only part of openDesk like OpenProject, but can also offer great added value for our users. Get started now Try OpenProject now with your team and get convinced!
